quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Song and Album
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, title, country. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Finish the title to this 1960 Ray Charles song ______on My Mind.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Georgia

questions.question: Which of these country artists recorded the song Shes So California on his album Living Hard?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gary Allan

questions.question: The members of the duo The White Stripes were once married.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Jan and Dean are heading out for this destination because they really like the odds. Where
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Surf City

questions.question: Glenn Danzig, who is considered to be one of the fathers of the Horrorpunk genre, has been with which of the listed bands?

options.text: Slayer, Black Flag, Nine Inch Nails
Rob Zombie, White Zombie, The Misfits

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Misfits, Samhain, Danzig

questions.question: Which of the following is a song by The Misfits?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: We are 138

questions.question: In 1982, Bruce Springsteen released an album and a song named after this state.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nebraska

questions.question: What type of flood did Stevie Ray Vaughn sing about in 1983?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Texas

questions.question: Which of these ladies released  the song The Night the Lights Went out in Georgia in 1973?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vicki Lawrence

questions.question: Which of these is NOT a Murderdolls song?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Elect Death For President

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a Type O Negative album?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stay Hungry

questions.question: All members of The Ramones are alive.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an AC/DC album?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Leave Home

questions.question: Who were the original members of The Misfits?

options.text: Jimmy Battle, Manny Martínez, Diane DiPiazza, Glenn Danzig
Angus Young, Malcom Young and Bon Scott
Glen Danzig, Jerry Only and Doyle Von Frankenstein
Wednesday 13, Joey Jordinson and Ben Graves

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Glen Danzig, Jerry Only and Doyle Von Frankenstein

questions.question: Which of these bands released the song Mississippi Queen in 1970?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mountain

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Song and Band
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, gon, title. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Did the band Slipknot release the song Iowa in 2001?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: Who performed the song Whatcha Gonna Do With a Cowboy? together with Garth Brooks?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chris LeDoux

questions.question: This group was big rock singers with golden fingers who sang about truth and beauty for ten thousand dollars a show. But there was one  thrill we have never known.  What group couldnt get their picture on the cover of the Rolling Stone?

options.text: Country Joe McDonal and the Fish
Dr. Hook and the Medicine Show

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dr. Hook and the Medicine Show

questions.question: On New Year Day, 1953, after announcing the death of this singer, a single spotlight lit the empty stage and behind closed curtains this singers back-up band, the Drifting Cowboys sang his song  I saw the Light . What legend died the night before in the backseat of a Cadillac on his way to perform in Canton, Ohio?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Luke the Drifter

questions.question: Booze and ladies keep me right as long as we can make it to the show tonight , bragged this band.  What band was an  American Band  coming to your town, we will help you party down ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Grand Funk

questions.question: A member of a band hears the phone ringing and knows its his girlfriend calling because she is lonely.  But unfortunately for the girlfriend,  I hope youll be alright
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Beth

questions.question: Kid Rock and Sheryl Crow sing a duet about a musician and his girlfriend.  His version:  Different girl every night at the hotel.  Aint seen the sunshine in three damn days.  Her version:  I put your picture away.  I wonder where youve been.  I cant look at you while Im lying next to him.  What is the name of the song?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Picture

questions.question: James Taylors song  Fire and Rain  tells of the death of a close friend, his struggles with drugs and his depression at the disbandment of a musical group in which he was part.  What was the name of  the musical group mentioned in this song?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Flying Machine

questions.question: Sara Mclachlan wrote about the loneliness and temptations of the road in her song Angel.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jonathan Melvoin

questions.question: Brewer and Shipley were awaitin in a railroad station.  Which song explains why were they  waiting for the train that goes home, sweet Mary, hopin the train is on time?

options.text: Mama Told Me Not to Come

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: One Toke over the Line

questions.question: Finish the title of this George Strait song from the album Does Fort Worth Ever Cross Your Mind: The Cowboy ___ ____
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rides Away

questions.question: Which female country artist released the song Its A Cowboy- Lovin Night in 1977?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tanya Tucker

questions.question: Simon and Garfunkel sing the following lyric

options.text: cording to the song where would Simon and Garfunkel rather be?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Homeward Bound

questions.question: Name the two country artists who performed the song Mamas Dont Let Your Babies Grow Up To Be Cowboys in 1978.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Waylon Jennings  Willie Nelson

questions.question: Who brought us the song Cowboy Boogie in 1993?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Randy Travis

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Radio and Storm
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, country, part. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The founder of the Quiet Storm format is now part owner of a large, Urban Contemporary radio station in San Francisco.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Originally, who was the targeted demographic of  Quiet Storm radio?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: African Americans

questions.question: What female artist performed Rodeo Cowboy in 1976?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lynn Anderson

questions.question: The roots of  Quiet Storm radio lie in which musical genre?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rhythm and Blues

questions.question: Is Smooth Jazz considered part of the Quiet Storm radio format?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: What song do the following lyrics come from: Ive been waitin all week just to have a good time..so bring on them cowboys and pick up lines...?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Here For The Party

questions.question: Who performed the song My Heroes Have Always Been Cowboys?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Willie Nelson

questions.question: Which of these events took place when Mozart was 12 years old?

options.text: Mozart was commissioned to write an opera
Mozart gave his first solo concert

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mozart was commissioned to write an opera

questions.question: What religious group did classical composer, Mozart join?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Freemasonry

questions.question: Which of the following artists would not be considered a Quiet Storm performer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eminem

questions.question: What city gave birth to the Quiet Storm radio?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Washington, D.C.

questions.question: What was the name of Mozarts wife?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Constanze Weber

questions.question: Who is credited with creating the Quiet Storm radio format?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Melvin Lindsey

questions.question: What country artist performed Shouldve Been a Cowboy in 1993?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Toby Keith

questions.question: In what year did the Quiet Storm radio format debut?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1976

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Mozart and Nickname
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, composers, vocalist. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which of these people was Mozarts greatest patron?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Emperor Joseph II of Vienna

questions.question: What popular female singer was asked to join the Black Eyed Peas before Fergie was introduced?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nicole Scherzinger

questions.question: Which of these is not a nickname of one of the Spice Girls members?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chili Spice

questions.question: What music video by the The Smashing Pumpkins won Video of the Year at the MTV Video Music Awards in 1996?

options.text: The End is the Beginning is the End

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tonight, Tonight

questions.question: Which famous work  by Mozart was left unfinished ?

options.text: The Requiem in D minor, K.626

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Requiem in D minor, K.626

questions.question: Which of these operas was composed by Mozart?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Magic Flute

questions.question: What is the name of Pearl Jams debut studio album, released on August 27, 1991?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ten

questions.question: What song by Hot Chocolate became their signature and best-known hit single?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: You Sexy Thing

questions.question: Which of these composers had no influence on  Mozart?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Beethovan

questions.question: Which of these great operas was not composed by Mozart?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tosca

questions.question: Which statement is true about British band Cream?

options.text: They were the first male music trio.
They were the first who dared to criticize politicians at their concerts.
They were the first male band to shoot a music video.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They were the first supergroup.

questions.question: Who became lead vocalist of American band Korn in 1993?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jonathan Davis

questions.question: What is the nickname of Red Hot Chili Peppers bassist Michael Balzary?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Flea

questions.question: Which English King called Mozart to his court in 1766?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: George III

questions.question: The summer of 1788 was a great time for Mozart . Why ?

options.text: He co-wrote an opera with Beethoven
He was made head Kappellmeister of Vienna
His wife gave birth to his first son
He composed his three best symphonies among, others

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He composed his three best symphonies among, others

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Lyrics and Song

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Iron Maiden

questions.question: The lyrics And I wish to you joy and happiness, but above all this i wish to you love are from this Whitney Houston song.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: I Will Always Love You

questions.question: Name the Elvis Presley song that contains the lyrics, Tell me you are mine; Ill be yours through all the years, till the end of time.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Love Me Tender

questions.question: What Mariah Carey song contains these lyrics: So when you feel like hope is gone look inside you and be strong?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hero

questions.question: What popular Tracy Chapman song contains the lyrics, I dont want no one to squeeze me, they might take away my life; I just want someone to hold me and rock me through the night?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Give Me One Reason

questions.question: This song by Chuck Berry contains the lyrics, He never ever learned to read or write so well, but he could play the guitar like ringing a bell.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Johnny B. Goode

questions.question: Which of the members of Salt-n-Pepa was nicknamed Spinderella?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Deidra Roper

questions.question: What popular song contains the lyrics, I felt he found my letters and read each one out loud. I prayed that he would finish, but he just kept right on?

options.text: Killing Me Softly With His Song

questions.question: Kill em All, Master of Puppets and Load are albums by what band?

options.text: Youre the One That I Want

questions.question: What band recorded the albums How Will I Laugh Tomorrow....(When I Cant Even Smile Today), Lights...Camera....Revolution and Still Cyco After All These Years?

questions.question: The following lyrics are from this very popular song: Romeo loved Juliet, and Juliet, she felt the same. When he put his arms around her, he said Julie baby, youre my flame.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fever

questions.question: Name the John Lennon song that contains the lines, You may say Im a dreamer, but Im not the only one; I hope someday youll join us and the world will be as one.

options.text: I Dont Want To Be A Soldier

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Imagine

questions.question: What song by The Cranberries, lamenting the troubles in Northern Ireland, is considered their biggest hit, and one of the greatest rock hits of the 1990s?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Zombie

questions.question: What is the title of the Irene Cara song that contains these lines: All alone I have cried silent tears full of pride, in a world made of steel, made of stone?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Flashdance... What a Feeling
